title: Factoring Rules
text: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.

title: Factoring Rules
text: What will our expression look like after using FOIL?

title: Squaring i
text: If $$i^2=-1$$, what will $$12-9i+8i-6i^2$$ be when we simplify i?
speech: If  i squared is equal to negative 1 , what will  12, minus 9 i plus 8 i minus 6 i squared  be when we simplify i?

, what will   12, minus 9 i plus 8 i minus 6 i squared

text: Combining like terms, what do we get?
